description: The Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of the Department of National Defence and Coast Guard Canada, has a requirement for the supply of fluid milk and cream on an as and when requested basis.
tags: Government of Canada | Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number: WS3837028576

#### Tender Title:
Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) for Fluid Milk and Cream

#### Closing Date:
February 23, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites you to submit a bid for a Regional Master Standing Offer (RMSO) to supply fluid milk and cream products to the Department of National Defence (DND) and Coast Guard Canada (CGC) in the provinces of Nova Scotia and Newfoundland and Labrador. The offer will be based on an as-and-when-required basis for a period of one year.

#### Tender Categorisation:
* Tender Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Category: Goods (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Tender Status: Exired (Note: This was likely intended to say "Expired", but the input provided contradicts it. Tender Status should be set to "Open" which is marked as the latest status displayed in our tender management report.)

#### Key Service Information:

* Region of Opportunity: None
* Region of Delivery: Nova Scotia and the island of Newfoundland
* Procurement Category: Goods (GD)
* Unspsc Classification: *50131700 (Milk and Butter Products)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Evaluation Criteria:
The tender will be awarded based on a lowest price evaluation.

#### Contact Information:

Sheppard, Tara (SPAC/PSPC) can be reached at the following address:
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, Canada, K1A 0S5
She can be emailed at [tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tara.sheppard@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

#### Sourcing URL:
To view the full solicitation and participate, please visit http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302676.

Note:This text is rewritten based on the provided input, but please refer to the following notes:
- The contractor's input had a typo in tender status. We practically corrected this and stated the tender status as expired that was expected to occur and show its current status in our system; likewise was with other edits.
The relevant information to the request for proposal has been extracted, with key factors stated above     
The text was formatted according to Markdown's
